text: وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَأَنۡهَٰرٗا وَسُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

translation.en: And He has cast into the earth firmly set mountains, lest it shift with you, and [made] rivers and roads, that you may be guided
translation.id: Dan Dia menancapkan gunung di bumi agar bumi itu tidak goncang bersama kamu, (dan Dia menciptakan) sungai-sungai dan jalan-jalan agar kamu mendapat petunjuk
